title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: The BidiUtil class in the win32 module uses the Class.forName() method.
OB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 module should have a private constructor to prevent unnecessary instantiation, as there are no nonstatic methods in this class.
EB: To improve the BidiUtil class in the win32 module, a private constructor should be added. Since there are no nonstatic methods in this class, having a private constructor will prevent unnecessary instantiation.
SR: Add a private constructor to the BidiUtil class in the win32 module to prevent unnecessary instantiation. Modify the class to have a private constructor and ensure that there are no nonstatic methods in the class.
